p.d: Questioned by Rainald Mann, Tina has no choice but to secretly collaborate with the federal police. At the same time, the political situation is becoming increasingly complicated for Kathy Kunz. In Yemen, the hostage-takers carry out their threats. The life of the Swiss diplomat hangs by a thread... Réalisation : Romain Graf (Suisse, 2019) Scénario : Thomas Eggel, Romain Graf, Léo Maillard Distribution : Flonja Kodheli (Tina), Ursina Lardi (Kathy Kunz), Roland Vouilloz (Rainald Mann), Çun Lajçi (Sami), Lisa Chapuisat (Sandra), Arben Bajraktaraj (Djeko), Yoann Blanc (Gaspard), Lucie Zelger (Elsa), Cédric Djedje (Malik), Gaspard Boesch (the informer), Jon Qela (Gazi), Esteban Sicilia (Marco), Fred Polier (Urs Frick), Darius Kehtari (Farouk Sadiki) Genre : policier Awards: best foreign francophone fiction at the 2019 La Rochelle Festival de la Fiction Parental guidance: TV-PG
